segments.text: I observe the scene carefully, taking it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on her dish-drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet left on, sink brimming over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped into the growing puddle unknowingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, reaching high for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance seems precarious at best.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waits patiently, palm upturned nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar full in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside view is serene, bushes lining the path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A moment of mischief in an otherwise tidy space.
segments.speaker: PAR
